title: Well, the new boards layout went live, GD is still here, and...

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: I'm sure we can expect a large influx of new players soon. Let's welcome them with every meme in the book, like this picture of a little girl representing sin and desire, and an upskirt.
